author: Jaclyn Schultz
title: 13-hour Las Vegas kitten rescue in 108-degree heat
text: 13-hour Las Vegas kitten rescue in 108-degree heat Mother cat and kittens stuck in a storm drain LAS VEGAS, Nev. (FOX5) - A Las Vegas family and volunteers spent 13 hours in up to 108-degree heat to rescue tiny kittens and their mother from a storm drain, and after a 22-hour ordeal, finally reunited the mother cat with her babies. FOX5 caught the strangers in action as they tried for hours to save each kitten. The ordeal happened off Lone Mountain Road west of the 215 Beltway. Dana Hernandez said her daughter and husband went for an early morning walk around 7:30 a.m. and heard crying in the storm drain. “They saw the mama cat jump into the sewer. That caught my four-year-old’s attention. My four-year-old was like, ‘I hear crying.’ My husband came over, he looked, he saw the kittens,” Hernandez said. Hernandez and her mother, Dr. Julie Woodward, called City of Las Vegas Animal Control several times, as well as the police department and the fire department. As temperatures soared, the family yanked off the storm drain to drop down water and food for the kittens and the mother. “Mommy is very emaciated. We gave her two cans of food and she ate all of it. She was starving,” Dr. Woodward said. Hernandez managed to crawl down the storm drain and save several kittens. The family took them to an emergency veterinarian, who said they were dehydrated and malnourished. Around 3 p.m., Animal Control arrived and aided with a small trap to try to retrieve the other cats. By 8:30 p.m., the volunteers were able to rescue more kittens, but they were still searching for the mother. Late Friday night, Animal Control officers dropped off another trap to help find the mother. “I’m thinking that there could be more [kittens] but maybe they haven’t made it. They’ve probably been in there for a couple of days. They’re very, very small,” Woodward said. “The mom has been a very doting mother. I really want to rescue the mom too,” Hernandez said. The family didn’t give up their efforts, even overnight. By 5 a.m. Saturday morning, the mission was complete: the mother cat was captured and reunited with her five kittens. “She is very scared but safe with all five of her kittens we rescued yesterday. Babies cried all night long, but when we added momma into the room with them a bit ago they all stopped and started nursing,” Hernandez posted on Facebook for an update. Dr. Woodward plans to adopt all the kittens. Copyright 2024 KVVU. All rights reserved.

organizations.name: city of las vegas animal control

author: Zahraa Tawbi
title: Condenan en Ecuador agresión israelí contra Gaza
text:
El movimiento Revolución Ciudadana de Ecuador (RC) rechazó este jueves los recientes ataques por parte del gobierno de Israel contra la Franja de Gaza y los enfrentamientos con el Movimiento de Resistencia Islámica, Hamas.
A través de un comunicado, la RC detalló que llevará ante el Pleno de la Asamblea Nacional un pronunciamiento en defensa del derecho internacional, los derechos humanos y los distintos tratados en ese sentido.
La indiferencia y esta capacidad funesta de convertir a los observadores en cómplices de la muerte, debe parar, advirtió en el documento.
La organización política también cuestionó que Ecuador preside el Consejo de Seguridad de Naciones Unidas, sin embargo -alertó- que ese encargo no se ha desempeñado con la contundencia que un momento tan doloroso a nivel mundial exige. “No podemos guardar silencio”, alertó la RC.
Desde que escaló el conflicto el 7 de octubre, ecuatorianos y extranjeros residentes en esta nación sudamericana han condenado la actitud de Israel con la agresión desmedida contra el pueblo palestino.
Source: Prensa Latina

author: Ravi Sinha
title: Overwatch 2 Season 10: Venture Forth Trailer Showcases Mirrorwatch, Mythic Mercy Skin and More
text:
The first gameplay trailer for Overwatch 2 Season 10, titled Venture Forth after its new Damage dealer, is live. It provides an overview of the content that players can expect, including a new limited-time event – Mirrorwatch. Check it out below.
As the name implies, Mirrorwatch sees Overwatch and Talon switching alignments. The former has red and black armor glowing with menace, while the latter has blue and white uniforms. While other characters also have different looks, perhaps the most detailed is Vengeance Mercy, the new Mythic Skin for the season.
When venturing into the new limited-time mode, players can take advantage of revamped abilities, like Mercy firing on enemies with her staff, Doomfist’s block creating a barrier to shield his allies, and more. Aside from Venture and Mirrorwatch, Season 10 also features a limited-time trial for Clash , the new game mode, and its first map, Hanaoka (a revamped version of Hanamura).
Overwatch 2 Season 10: Venture Forth starts on April 16th , so stay tuned for more details.

author: Максим Рокатанский
title: Брянским школьникам снижали баллы ЕГЭ за экстремизм и иностранные слова
text:
Сочинения брянских выпускников на ЕГЭ по русскому языку, как и у их сверстников по всей России, этим летом оценивались по новым критериям. В частности, появилось уточнение критерия «соблюдению этических норм». Баллы можно было потерять за противозаконные высказывания, пропаганду экстремизма, фашизма и нетрадиционных ценностей, а также употребление нецензурной брани и иностранных слов, имеющих аналоги в русском языке.
Вокруг последнего в блогах и соцсетях сейчас началась натуральное бурление мыслящей слизи под лозунгом «Иностранные слова в сочинении на ЕГЭ приравняли к оправданию ФАШИЗМА!». В качестве эксперта, в частности, выступает блогер-научпопер филолог Светлана Гурьянова, назвавшая нововведение попыткой государства «регламентировать жизнь людей и их речь».
Почему общественность дремала целый год, нам совершенно непонятно. Ведь нарушения в блоке «речевое оформление сочинения», из-за которых школьник может потерять баллы на экзамене, прописали еще прошлым летом. И, разумеется, то, что нарушения перечислены через запятую, вовсе не ставит знак равенства между явлениями, к которым они относятся. Филологу следовало бы это знать.

author: Presbyterian Church
title: Presbyterian Church (U.S.A.) - Prayer for our nation during tumultuous times
text: Dear God, We pray for the unity of our nation. Heal the wounds of division and discord. Foster in us a spirit of reconciliation and mutual respect so that we may come together in our shared humanity to seek the well-being of all your children. Lord, in these times of uncertainty, help us to remember that our ultimate allegiance is to your Kin-dom. Fill our hearts with love, compassion and a relentless commitment to justice. Empower us to be peacemakers, bridge builders and advocates for truth. In Your infinite wisdom, guide our nation’s leaders. May they govern with righteousness and compassion. Grant them the courage to seek the common good over partisan interests, and the discernment to make decisions that foster peace and justice for all. May they be compassionate toward the vulnerable and the marginalized, working tirelessly to ensure that every voice is heard and valued. Lord, as we enter this election season, we lift our nation to you. We pray for every citizen, every candidate and every public servant. We ask for your protection over our democratic processes and institutions. May they reflect integrity, transparency and fairness, honoring the dignity and worth of every individual created in your image. As we navigate through these tumultuous times, we are reminded of the sacred duty you have entrusted to us — to do justice, to love kindness and to walk humbly with you, our God. May we strive to be your justice seekers and peacemakers in our church sanctuaries and civic duties. In the name of Jesus Christ, who is our peace and our hope, we pray. Amen. Rev. Bronwen Boswell Acting Stated Clerk of the General Assembly Presbyterian Church (U.S.A.)
